nodes.text: Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery was a cosmetic surgery clinic operated by Dr. Cornelius Evazan in Pons Ora, a small settlement located on the remote desert world of Abafar. By the year 20 BBY, it had gone out of business and the building that once housed it was available for lease.

Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery was a cosmetic surgery clinic located in Pons Ora, a small settlement located on Abafar, a remote desert world located in the Sprizen sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. An Aurebesh sign that read "DR. EVAZAN" was located on the corner of the business, and another one that said "COSMETIC SURGERY" was positioned above its entrance. The clinic was situated near the base of the Pons Ora water tower, across the street from Admiral Snackbar and in close proximity to apartment 6C. When Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery closed down, an Aurebesh sign that read "OUT OF BUSINESS" was placed on its front door and another one that said "FOR LEASE" was put on the establishment's window.

Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery was operated by Dr. Cornelius Evazan. By the year 20 BBY, it had gone out of business and the building that once housed it was available for lease. D-Squad, a squad of droids under the command of Colonel Meebur Gascon in service to the Galactic Republic, passed by the closed down Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery while walking though Pons Ora after escaping the Void, a featureless and seemingly endless wasteland that covered the entirety of Abafar.
Dr. Evazan Cosmetic Surgery first appeared in "Missing in Action," the twelfth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fifth season, which originally aired on January 5, 2013.
